key_events.description: Occupancy rate reached 95.3% in January 2026, the highest level in five years.
Fund manager updated estimated monthly distribution to be between R$ 0.84 and R$ 0.90 per share until December 2026.

key_events.event_name: Cap Rate from Villa Romana Stake Sale
key_events.description: Estimated cap rate of 7.3% based on NOI cash flow for the 12 months ending in April 2023, related to the sale of a stake in Villa Romana Shopping.
Expectation of a cap rate of 8.9% for the next 12 months and a yield of 9.5%, considering only the portion paid in cash.

investment_thesis.bull_case: High occupancy rates and consistent dividend distributions make VISC11 an attractive investment.
investment_thesis.bear_case: Lack of specific tenant news and potential fluctuations in vacancy rates pose risks.

summary_markdown: VISC11 shows positive signs with an occupancy rate reaching 95.3% in January 2026, the highest in five years. The fund manager updated the estimated monthly distribution to be between R$ 0.84 and R$ 0.90 per share until December 2026. An estimated cap rate of 7.3% is reported based on the NOI cash flow for the 12 months ending in April 2023, related to the sale of a stake in Villa Romana Shopping. The expectation is that the transaction generates a cap rate of 8.9% for the next 12 months, as well as a yield of 9.5%, taking into account only the portion that was paid in cash.
